description: Alnasca Knit II Low Men with 3D Knit for a perfect fit and ideal comfort. The approach shoe also features Basefit and specially developed lacing for outstanding support. Michelin outsole for closeness to the rocks and excellent grip on any alpine approach. Its design, material, fit and technology make the Alnasca an innovative symbiosis that proves its worth in via ferrata, hiking and approaches.
name: Mammut Alnasca Knit II Low - Mens
